data.md:MetaData: Track of GPS very-near surface drifter ISMER_20141027_spot065

Drogue depth: 0.2 m. Drifter type: 30-cm wide 4-cm thick wooden plaftorm with a 1-kg weight hanging 20 cm below the platform. Originators: Dany Dumont, Paul Nicot, Tamkpanka Tamtare. Institution: Institut des science de la mer de Rimouski (ISMER). Email: dany_dumont@uqar.ca

Palaeoenvironmental and palaeohydrological variability of mountain areas in the central Mediterranean region: A 190 ka-long chronicle from the independently dated Fucino palaeolake record (central Italy)
